text: The 1925 Drexel Dragons football team was an American football team that represented Drexel University as an independent during the 1925 college football season. In its fourth season under head coach Harry J. O'Brien, Drexel compiled a 1–7 record. The team's only victory was over the . ==Schedule== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Drexel Football
